What is your overall assessment of this course
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.

What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved

Comments_List: Further knowledge of Portuguese. Definitely improved most my speaking skills during this part of the course.
So much Portuguese. After taking this course I feel fluent in Portuguese.

I learned more advanced Portuguese vocabulary and grammar in this course. By the end I could write simple (200 words) compositions with relative ease and manage to navigate Rio de Janeiro on my own or with friends.
I learned elementary Portuguese and was able to make use of what I learned on a daily basis.
I developed the ability to speak, read, and understand Portuguese while learning about Brazilian culture.
I learned more advanced levels of the Portuguese language.
Just as well taught as the first part of the course. Only recommendation would be to maybe make us go out more in Rio during class time.
I think it was a well organized course, overwhelmed at times but thats due to the intensive nature of the program.

I think the course built on itself well. We began to move very fast at one point which was due to the short amount of time we had but I think all the different ways we learned - many written exercises, compositions, watching movies and videos, and of course being in Rio de Janeiro - made it manageable and conducive to actually retaining material.
The class only had strengths. It was constantly engaging for students and made learning another language fun.
The course was very strong and well taught. I don't have any suggestions for how to improve it.
The strength was how interactive the course was. The weakness was how much was covered in such little time.
Without any hesitation! I had the best summer of my life in Brazil and this immersion experience was life-changing.
Yes it was an amazing experience and you learn so much.
Yes, without a doubt if they want to start to gain knowledge of another language.
I would recommend this to any student who wishes to learn a second romance language.
Yes, I would. It is an amazing course that teaches you another language as well as the culture of a group of people who speak it. There is so much more than just language taught in the course.
Yes, it was excellently taught by the professor.
